job_info.title: Senior Engineer - AI Agents & Autonomous Systems
job_info.description:
Build AI agents that can autonomously accomplish complex tasks.
                Work on agentic AI systems for enterprise and consumer applications.
requirements: Experience with LLMs and tool integration
Background in planning and reasoning systems

highlights: NeurIPS 2025 CureBench Global 2nd Place - AI Agent development
CureAgent framework, Executor-Analyst architecture, tool-augmented reasoning
Deployed Ollama, llama.cpp, vllm, TensorRT-LLM, mlc-llm
